export ZENOPS_HOME=/home/z/zenops && echo $ZENOPS_HOME
rm -rf ${ZENOPS_HOME}/docker/jenkins && mkdir -p ${ZENOPS_HOME}/docker/jenkins && chmod 666 ${ZENOPS_HOME}/docker/jenkins

docker run \
  -d --name jenkins \
  -u 0 \
  -p 58080:8080 \
  -p 50000:50000 \
  -v /home/ghuser/docker/jenkins:/var/jenkins_home \
  --restart always \
  jenkins/jenkins
